recipe.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
recipe.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with fresh herbs and citrus

steps.descr: Preheat grill or pan to medium-high heat
steps.instructions: Preheat grill or pan to medium-high heat

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by preheating the grill or pan to a lovely medium-high heat. This will give us that perfect sear on the salmon.

steps.descr: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper
steps.instructions: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Now, let's mix together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper. Give it a good whisk until everything is well combined. You should smell that fresh lemon and garlic aroma!
Lovely! Now, let's brush that beautiful salmon with our marinade. Make sure it's nicely coated for maximum flavour.
Time to place the salmon skin-side down on the grill. We're going to let it cook for five minutes. You'll hear it sizzle and see the skin crisp up beautifully.

steps.descr: Flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes
steps.instructions: Flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes

on_enter.say: Great job! Now let's flip the salmon over and cook it for another three to four minutes. It should be just cooked through and still juicy.

steps.descr: Top with fresh dill and lemon slices
steps.instructions: Top with fresh dill and lemon slices

on_enter.say: Now for the finishing touch! Let's top our salmon with fresh dill and a few slices of lemon. This will add a lovely fresh flavour.
Right, it's time to plate up! Serve your beautiful grilled salmon with some roasted asparagus on the side. Enjoy your meal!

notes.text:
Don't overcook - salmon should be slightly pink in center
Let salmon come to room temperature before cooking
Crispy skin is delicious - don't skip it
